attributes.action: Introduce Pro Evolution Soccer as an official subject at Brittish Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that all children should be encouraged to learn the basics of what many believe to be the greatest "sport" of the 21 century.. 

It strikes me that pro evolution soccer has become such an important social/entertainment product, that for a child to not have a basic ability to play the game is of great detriment to their ability to function in later life.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
